mapper.select: SELECT p.ID, p.PDF_TYPE pdfType, p.REMOTE_ADDRESS_IP remoteAddressIp, p.REC_REG_USER_ID recRegUserId, p.REC_REG_USER_NM recRegUserNm, p.REC_REG_CORP_NM recRegCorpNm, p.REC_REG_YMD recRegYmd, p.REC_REG_JKK recRegJkk, d.CUST_INFO_CUST_NO custInfoCustNo, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_SEI custInfoNameSei, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_MEI custInfoNameMei, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_SEI_KN custInfoNameSeiKn, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_MEI_KN custInfoNameMeiKn FROM PDF_HKK_LOG p INNER JOIN MTMR m ON p.MTMR_NO = m.MTMR_NO INNER JOIN DW_APPLICATION_DETAIL d ON m.uktk_no = d.uktk_no WHERE p.LINKED_FLG = 0 AND p.REC_REG_USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND p.REC_REG_USER_ID <> '' UNION SELECT p.ID, p.PDF_TYPE pdfType, p.REMOTE_ADDRESS_IP remoteAddressIp, p.REC_REG_USER_ID recRegUserId, p.REC_REG_USER_NM recRegUserNm, p.REC_REG_CORP_NM recRegCorpNm, p.REC_REG_YMD recRegYmd, p.REC_REG_JKK recRegJkk, d.CUST_INFO_CUST_NO custInfoCustNo, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_SEI custInfoNameSei, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_MEI custInfoNameMei, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_SEI_KN custInfoNameSeiKn, d.CUST_INFO_NAME_MEI_KN custInfoNameMeiKn FROM PDF_HKK_LOG p INNER JOIN DW_APPLICATION_DETAIL d ON p.uktk_no = d.uktk_no WHERE p.LINKED_FLG = 0 AND p.PDF_TYPE= '5' AND p.REC_REG_USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND p.REC_REG_USER_ID <> '' ORDER BY recRegUserId, recRegYmd, pdfType
mapper.update: UPDATE PDF_HKK_LOG SET LINKED_FLG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
